item.title: Azn CheatClient FIX! HELP PLEASE damn u Azn
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:5, topic:69783”][quote author=ThatOneServer link=topic=102497.msg1036947#msg1036947 date=1174550642]
Well, this is not a nooby forums like the runescape ones. You use capitals in your titles, and make sure you spell everything right. Also, make sure the title explains what the thread will be about. Not just ‘Help’ or ‘Error’. In the thread, add an in depth description of what it is about, containing the main idea, and the details.Just because the title says it, you need to restate it. The little things matter… If your thread was neat and organized, you would get help much faster. Once again, try harder.

Other things to avoid:

  1. Using words that are in all caps in the title (e.g. DRAGON GLITCH)
  2. Using “u” instead of “you” and “r” instead of “are” (e.g. U r the bomb!)
  3. Abbreviating words (e.g. Hlp me Plz! I cnt fx it myslf!)
  4. Double Posting (Just edit the previous post instead of posting again)
    ~ThatOneServer
    [/quote]

Why do we have to be so proper, isnt this entire site about building ghetto rs2 servers, Which are not that good themselves?[/quote]

it becuz we al dnt undrstnd ubr leet languege n we r matrue anof 2 use propr punctuatn n spellng!

Read full topic

item.title: Azn CheatClient FIX! HELP PLEASE damn u Azn
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

I prefer a less intrusive approach; simply log on and tell the server “NPC attack index 99999999999” and it will crash with ArrayIndexOutOfBounds. Poor schlubs. Also if you null the server to death anyone still connected isn’t kicked off.

Read full topic

Hiaburi:

I know that my idea would be easy to get around, but it would stop all the leaching, wannabe leet newbs from spawning or lagging with a client.

1: It is not YOUR idea, don’t even get me started
2: I’m one of very few who has ever been known to intentionally break “rules” on a “server” involving clientside “commands”, I do it so that the “programmer” who “programmed” said “server” will be forced to do a better job.

item.title: Azn CheatClient FIX! HELP PLEASE damn u Azn
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

[quote=“ZeroFreeze, post:2, topic:69806”][quote author=Javacisnotrecognized link=topic=102497.msg1037167#msg1037167 date=1174561139]

Hiaburi, this isn’t a R3tardzzz comnuty s0 datz y.

I never said it was… And if your implying im retarded -.-… you don’t want to do that.

[me=Javacisnotrecognized]applauds seal style in protest to that comment[/me]
[/quote]
^ Lmfao ‘seal style’… Javac and his jokes

@ Hiaburi: Don’t take everything as an insult or negative comment; think positive, be positive XD
I wasn’t implying you as a retard, I was just pointing out that we’re not a r3t4rd cmnuty ;)[/quote]
A little bit about me:
I take everything as an insult, i hate life, life hates me, every one hates me, i hate every one, my luck is horrible, im on probation for the rest of my life for saying “I am not afraid to hit you”, my dad is dead, i live in a completely corrupt town, my life sucks

Hiaburi = jap for “Burn at the stake” or “To burn to death”

“I wasn’t implying you as a retard,” UM i think that it would be “I wasn’t implying you are a retard,”

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:12, topic:69783”]I actually meant something a bit more involved than that. But I can undo that as well.

The correct fix (Which is far farr faaaaaaaaarr from any of the average servertard you’ll meet) is to not make “assumptions” and “guesses” about the validity of a walkToTile/pickUpGroundItem/stuff request.[/quote]

I know that my idea would be easy to get around, but it would stop all the leaching, wannabe leet newbs from spawning or lagging with a client.

Read full topic
